Structure# AsyncShareablePassConfiguration

PassKitSwiftUIiOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystvisionOS

```
@MainActor @preconcurrency
struct AsyncShareablePassConfiguration<Content> where Content : View
```
